This website (Two, by me.) is a F.S.F. and "Libre" ethos supporter and stands tall with advocay apropos privacy online. If you're considering to donate to the Luser, we'd like to inform you that the funds would be exclusively used for building free-as-in-beer tools and services, and for upkeeping the-then servers and servers only. An annual tithe of 10% may be taken out for the 9xO capital fund (A *Wealth Redistribution Schema, Algorithm* to propogate perpetual Universal Basic Income).
